work in the round being careful not to twist place marker for beginning of round round 1 *k1 p1* to the end 1x1 rib repeat round 1 until ribbing measures about 1/1/1 5/1 5 2/2 inch es body knit until hat measures approximately 5/5 75/6 25/6 75 7 75/8 25 inches total from cast on edge crown switch to dpns when necessary round 1 *k2 k2tog* to end 24/30/33/36 39/42 stitches remaining rounds 2 *k2tog* to end k1 if there is an extra stitch remaining 12/15/17/18 20/21 stitches remaining round 3 *k2tog* to end k1 if there is an extra stitch remaining 6/8/9/9 10/11 stitches remaining break yarn and weave through remaining stitches twice and then bring through to wrong side finishing using tapestry needle or your preferred method weave in all ends block hat be sure to shape and let dry thoroughly
